  index: "my-index-000001",
  mappings: {
    subobjects: false,
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  id: "metric_1",
  document: {
    time: "100ms",
    "time.min": "10ms",
    "time.max": "900ms",
  },
});
console.log(response1);
